title: Verticle Sync FPS issue
body:
Hey guys,

So yesterday when I played my first game, for some reason my FPS had dropped to 20 fps (it's usually steady 60 with v sync turned on). I updated my NVidia driver and it seemed to fix the issue, however now with v sync turned on, FPS varies between 58-62. When it drops bellow 60 it causes a weird stutter that I can't stand.

Would anyone know what's going on and how to put it back to how it was?

My computer specs: I5 6500 3.2ghz, 8gb RAM, GTX 950 2gb, 1tb HHD

replies.body: The issue here might be due to a recent nvidia update that's causing shadowplay to act wonky.  To rule out this possibility, try disabling [Shadowplay ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2xQMVVX7_30)for the fix.  Let me know if that helps!
